SCOPE & STOP Hormones and MetS Analysis Overview

SCOPE & STOP Hormones and MetS Analysis 20 December 2023 Overview This page contains analysis results for SCOPE and STOP Hormones and metabolic syndrome analysis. Part I: MetS This section contains analyses of hormones vs metabolic syndrome (new criteria).

2 Models Fit GEE models to account for repeated measures. Outcomes: Hormones, Insulin, Glucose (all outcomes log-transformed) Independent variables: Study, GA at sampling Model fitted: LME model       log(hormones) ~ Study + GA at sampling + Study:GA at sampling")       Unstructured covariance matrix The following outcomes do not have repeated measures and analysed using multiple linear regression: Folate Folate:B12 CRP RCF BMI FA supplementation
